shortdesc.ph: Starts screen capture from the specified video source.

p.codeblock: virtual int startScreenCapture(VIDEO_SOURCE_TYPE sourceType, const ScreenCaptureConfiguration& config) = 0;

section.p:
This method supports starting screen capture from the specified video source, suitable for multi-channel or local compositing scenarios. The Agora SDK provides multiple screen capture methods. Choose based on your needs:
/ / : Supports capturing a single screen or window only, suitable for sharing a single screen.
: Supports capturing multiple screen sharing streams from multiple video sources, suitable for local compositing or multi-channel scenarios.

ul.li: If you start screen capture using this method, you need to call stopScreenCapture to stop it.
On Windows, up to four screen capture video streams are supported.
On macOS, only one screen capture video stream is supported.
This method is available on macOS and Windows only.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: Used for screen sharing scenarios, supports multi-channel usage.

section.title: Timing
section.p:
You can call this method before or after joining a channel, as follows:
Call this method first, then call joinChannel and set publishScreenCaptureVideo to to start screen sharing.
Call this method after joining the channel, then call and set publishScreenCaptureVideo to to start screen sharing.

plentry.pd: Type of video source. See . On macOS, this parameter must be set to VIDEO_SOURCE_SCREEN (2).
